018package org.tquadrat.bloodpressure;
019
020import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
021
022import java.io.File;
023import java.io.IOException;
024import java.sql.SQLException;
025import java.util.Optional;
026import java.util.Set;
027
028import org.apiguardian.api.API;
029import org.tquadrat.bloodpressure.spi.ReportBase;
030import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
031
032/**
033 *  The definition of a report generator.
034 *
035 *  @version $Id: Report.java 122 2022-02-12 20:09:13Z tquadrat $
036 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
037 *  @UMLGraph.link
038 *  @since 0.0.1
039 */
040@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: Report.java 122 2022-02-12 20:09:13Z tquadrat $" )
041@API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.1" )
042public sealed interface Report
043    permits ReportBase
044{
045        /*-----------*\
046    ====** Constants **========================================================
047        \*-----------*/
048
049        /*---------*\
050    ====** Methods **==========================================================
051        \*---------*/
052    /**
053     *  Generates the report and writes it to the destination from the
054     *  configuration.
055     *
056     *  @param  destination The destination for the generated report.
057     *  @param  format  The output format for the report.
058     *  @throws IOException A problem was encountered when writing the report
059     *      to the destination.
060     *  throws SQLException A problem was encountered when retrieven the data
061     *      from the database.
062     */
063    public void generateReport( final File destination, final ReportFormat format ) throws IOException, SQLException;
064
065    /**
066     *  Returns the report style.
067     *
068     * @return  The report style.
069     */
070    public String getStyle();
071
072    /**
073     *  Retrieves the report generator for the given style and format.
074     *
075     *  @param  style   The report style.
076     *  @param  format  The output format for the report.
077     *  @return An instance of
078     *      {@link Optional}
079     *      that holds the report generator. It will be
080     *      {@linkplain Optional#empty()}
081     *      if there is no registered report for the given style, or when the
082     *      style does not support the requested format.
083     */
084    public static Optional<Report> retrieveReport( final String style, final ReportFormat format )
085    {
086        return ReportBase.retrieveReport( style, format );
087    }   //  retrieveReport()
088
089    /**
090     *  Returns the supported output formats.
091     *
092     *  @return The supported output formats.
093     */
094    public Set<ReportFormat> supportedOutputFormats();
095}
096//  interface Report
097
098/*
099 *  End of File
100 */
